About Norton’s Antivirus

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.0.9″ background_color=”#ffffff” background_enable_image=”off” width=”70%” width_tablet=”90%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width=”none” module_alignment=”right” custom_padding=”0px|60px|60px|60px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|40px|40px|40px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|20px|20px|20px|false|true” module_alignment_tablet=”” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.0.9″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” header_2_font=”Spectral||||||||” header_2_font_size=”4vw” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” background_enable_color=”off” width=”100%” text_font_size_tablet=”15px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”50px” header_2_font_size_phone=”35px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

Norton’s antivirus program has experienced some issues throughout the years. For example, confusing data, a complex user interface, and sluggish performance. However, all of that needs to change these days. Norton 360

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.0.9″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_line_height=”1.8em” text_font_size_tablet=”15px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop”]

  • Performance is not much impacted by full Scans.
         Assistance for Basic Clients Features on Apple devices that are suitable for families

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Shop Now” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”12px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_color=”#383e47″ button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”2px” button_font=”|700||on|||||” custom_margin=”20px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”12px|24px|12px|24px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” button_url=”https://hivestore.shop/product-category/norton/” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” background_image=”https://hivestore.shop/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Norton-Logo.png” width=”40%” width_tablet=”80%” width_phone=”80%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”off|desktop” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”60px|60px|60px|60px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”40px|40px|40px|40px|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”|20px||20px|false|true”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.9″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ header_font=”||||||||” header_6_font=”Spectral||||||||” header_6_text_color=”#ffffff” header_6_font_size=”24px” header_6_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”540px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||10px||false|false” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off”]

Winter Staff Picks

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Shop Now” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”2px” button_font=”|700||on|on||||” custom_padding=”15px|30px|15px|30px|true|true” hover_enabled=”0″ locked=”off” button_url=”https://hivestore.shop/product-category/norton/” sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” min_height=”284.8px” custom_margin=”||-106px|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

 It protects your device from harmful software and makes managing your security easier with features such as cloud storage, VPN, and a password keeper.
 It also boasts a limited set of harmful features, making it one of the top-rated products in the store.
We’re confident that Norton 360 is the best Norton product available. It’s been recognized as one of the leading antivirus solutions by our team, alongside competitors like Kaspersky and TotalAV in 2020’s best antivirus rankings. Norton consistently ranks as one of the best in terms of cybersecurity, proving its effectiveness as an antivirus software.
Norton achieved perfect results in protecting my computer against 17 different malware tests, matching the performance of other major brands like Bitdefender and McAfee. It quickly identified and stopped all malicious activities.
Norton also prevented attempts to encrypt files, steal data, and use the computer for cryptocurrency mining. We tested Norton’s Full Scan, which took less than 2 hours to complete, and we were able to use the computer throughout the scan without any issues.
Norton’s Full Scan identified a file that was intentionally bypassed by the real-time protection feature, which it did not block.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”New Arrivals” _builder_version=”4.0.9″ min_height=”630px” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.0.9″ min_height=”519px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.0.9″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Spectral||||||||” header_2_font_size=”60px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”800px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”|-23px||||” header_2_font_size_tablet=”50px” header_2_font_size_phone=”35px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off”]
